mainText:
Promotional Message: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes a Reality! Unleash your inner royal with our exclusive banking services today! 

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling magnificently down the boulevard, when suddenly my gourmet coffee spilled all over my perfectly tailored suit. The audacity of that gravity! Outraged, I stormed into Bank of Entitlement, demanding immediate compensation for this atrocity. With an imperious wave of my hand, I declared, "I demand a year's supply of gourmet coffee and a VIP lounge in my name!" The bank, trembling at my regal presence, complied without hesitation. As I sipped my free coffee and reclined in my new lounge, I chuckled to myself, knowing that in this world, true entitlement reigns supreme.
